程序包 draw3
的使用

  • draw3使用的draw3中的类 
    类和说明
    PenModel
    The class PenModel is used to save all the model data, including the pen's size, color, position and the actual as well as the guessing words
    penView
    The class penView is to change the view once the model is changed
    penViewController
    The penViewController is the core part of the game, it connects to the model and all the performances
    ShowMessage
